lead_paragraph: Martina Hingis has been picked for Switzerland's team for a Fed Cup semifinal against the defending champion Czech Republic, 18 years after leading the team to its previous final appearance.

headline.print_headline: Hingis, Bencic Picked to Lead Swiss in Fed Cup Semifinal
headline.main: Hingis, Bencic Picked to Lead Swiss in Fed Cup Semifinal
